Description.Name: Bomb-diggity
Description.Details: Darius barges in through the open doorway to your office, followed by Yang, Sumire and Dr Murad, "Commander, the live feed from Front Man is active again." You look up at everyone, "Put it on the screen, Darius. Ok folks, let's hope [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] makes it through this." Darius punches in some information on the terminal next to the large display screen mounted on the wall in your office, "Transmission coming in now, Commander." The black screen shimmers to life, the blurry images slowly taking focus. The image resolves into a view of [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] being escorted down a hallway along with a number of other players, each with a number displayed on their shirts. You all stare intently at the screen, eyes riveted hoping that [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] wins this round and continues on to the finale. ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::Hidden game arena on [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]]:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] walks down the hallway with {SCN_MW.DET} fellow contestants. There are guards with them, their faces covered with full masks reminding {SCN_MW.OBJ} of DEST Commando soldiers. One by one, the procession stops and a player is ushered into a room with a guard. Eventually, it is [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]'s turn to enter a room. {SCN_MW.SUBJ_C} looks around, seeing four blank walls and a mirror. Thankfully there is not the chair or the laser pistol so {SCN_MW.SUBJ} knows this will be a different kind of game. The guard pulls a circular ring shaped device out of a satchel they are carrying. The ring is hinged on one side with four coloured wires coming out of it and connected to a box. The guard opens ring and moves over to [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] and secures it around {SCN_MW.DET} neck. The guard then clips the box to [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]'s belt, with the four wires running up across {SCN_MW.DET} chest to the collar. The guard then exits the room and a voice is heard over the loud speaker: "Welcome players to the next game. The name of today's game is BOMB-DIGGITY. The objective is to disarm the bomb in the wired collar around your neck. To do this, you must cut one of the wires leading from the trigger to the collar. Cut the correct wire, and it will disable the device. You have 60 seconds to cut the wire. The clock begins... NOW!" A hatch opens in the ceiling and a pair of wire snips falls to the floor. [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] quickly grabs up the snips, and moves over to the mirror, inspecting each wire to garner some inclination as to which one should be cut. "TIME LEFT 30 SECONDS" [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] stares into the mirror before closing {SCN_MW.DET} eyes. {SCN_MW.SUBJ_C} opens them, then raises the snips up to... ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::Back on the ARGO:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Darius yells out to the screen, "Cut the RED wire!" Yang looks at Darius, "Are you daft? The BLACK wire is the one to cut." Sumire smiles, "Clearly the WHITE wire is the one that should be cut." Dr Murad ponders the options before responding, "I would cut the BLUE wire." ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::Hidden game arena on [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]]:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] moves the wire snips into position and decides to...

Description.Name: WE HAVE A WINNER!
Description.Details: ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::Hidden game arena on [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]]:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] reaches up , hand shaking, to place the wire snips closer to the one of the four wires. "20 Seconds Remaining..." {SCN_MW.SUBJ_C} {SCN_MW.Gender?NonBinary:close|Default:closes} {SCN_MW.DET} eyes and mumbles what appears to be a prayer. "15 Seconds Remaining..." [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] opens {SCN_MW.DET} eyes and stares intently at the reflection of the wires in the mirror, quickly inspecting each one, hoping for some sign of which is the correct wire to cut. "10 Seconds Remaining..." {SCN_MW.SUBJ_C} {SCN_MW.Gender?NonBinary:are|Default:is} about to choose a wire when... "Players 17, 36, 54, 112, 185 and 247 have been eliminated." "7 Seconds Remaining..." {SCN_MW.Subj_C} {SCN_MW.Gender?NonBinary:grab|Default:grabs} the RED wire and puts the wire snips in position to cut it.. "Players 12, 82, 136, 215 and 249 have been eliminated." "3 Seconds Remaining..." {SCN_MW.SUBJ_C} {SCN_MW.Gender?NonBinary:close|Default:closes} {SCN_MW.DET} eyes and cuts the RED wire... "Player 203, you have passed this round and will advance to the final game." Tears of joy stream down {SCN_MW.DET} face as reality sinks in that {SCN_MW.SUBJ} {SCN_MW.Gender?NonBinary:have|Default:has} successfully passed this round. ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::Back on the ARGO:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: You and the rest of the bridge crew shout out in unison, "{SCN_MW.SUBJ_C} did it!" Barely able to contain the smiles on your faces, everyone watches the events continuing to unfold on the screen. ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::Hidden game arena on [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]]:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: The door behind [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] opens and two armed and fully masked guards enter. They remove the collar and belt device and confiscate the wire snips. [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] looks at them, knowing the drill and shuffles out the open doorway towards {SCN_MW.DET} own cell. When they finally stop in front the door with the numbers 203 painted on it, the door opens and [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] enters the room. [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] sits on the bed and mutters, "One more game, and then my debt is erased. I can do this. One more game." The voice sounds over the comms, "All players, the next round will begin tomorrow. Lights out in 15 minutes." ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::Back on the ARGO:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: The screen fades out, and is replaced with a SIGNAL TERMINATED notice. Darius looks at you, "Commander, I said it yesterday, pure randomness here, no skill involved. At least we know that [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] only needs to win one more game." Both Yang and Sumire look at Dr Murad when Yang states, "Hey Doc, what is your scientific analysis of this 'game'?" Dr Murad finishes rewatching some of the holo-feed, "Well, the only 'scientific' data I can present actually confirms what Darius has stated. This appears to be nothing more than a series of random tests, a 'leave it to the roll of the dice' decision." You drop into your chair, exhausted from the elation that [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] has survived to reach the final game, but fearful that {SCN_MW.DET} situation can change in the blink of an eye. You look up at Darius, "Let the crew know that [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] has successfully passed Round 2 and is proceeding to the final game soon. "

Description.Name: GAME OVER
Description.Details: ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::Hidden game arena on [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]]:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] reaches up , hand shaking, to place the wire snips closer to the one of the four wires. "20 Seconds Remaining..." {SCN_MW.SUBJ_C} {SCN_MW.Gender?NonBinary:close|Default:closes} {SCN_MW.DET} eyes and mumbles what appears to be a prayer. "15 Seconds Remaining..." [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] opens {SCN_MW.DET} eyes and stares intently at the reflection of the wires in the mirror, quickly inspecting each one, hoping for some sign of which is the correct wire to cut. "10 Seconds Remaining..." {SCN_MW.SUBJ_C} {SCN_MW.Gender?NonBinary:are|Default:is} about to choose a wire when... "Players 17, 36, 54, 112, 185 and 247 have been eliminated." "7 Seconds Remaining..." {SCN_MW.Subj_C} {SCN_MW.Gender?NonBinary:grab|Default:grabs} the RED wire and puts the wire snips in position to cut it.. "Players 12, 82, 136, 215 and 249 have been eliminated." "3 Seconds Remaining..." {SCN_MW.SUBJ_C} {SCN_MW.Gender?NonBinary:close|Default:closes} {SCN_MW.DET} eyes and cuts the RED wire... ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::Back on the ARGO:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: The holo-feed screen flares bright white and a resounding boom pops through the speakers. Slowly, the screen comes back into focus. Lying on the floor, in a pool of gore and blood is the headless body of [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]. {SCN_MW.SUBJ_C} {SCN_MW.Gender?NonBinary:are|Default:is} only identifiable by the bloodstained PLAYER 203 on {SCN_MW.DET} shirt. The holo-feed continues to flicker, obviously damaged by the explosion. A voice is heard, "Player 203, Eliminated." You watch as Darius, Sumire, Dr Murad and Yang stare at the holo-feed in stunned silence, before dropping yourself into your chair at your desk, mumbling various expletives more to yourself than anyone in the room. Yang breaks the silence, "That has to be the dumbest thing I think I have ever witnessed! Who would concoct such a game?" Dr Murad speaks up, barely able to talk without choking up, "Actually Yang, these types of games are spread throughout history. On Terra, there was a game called Russian Roulette which involved a rotary firearm and a single round, and each participant pointing the weapon at the other one until it eventually fired on a loaded chamber. These games offer similar odds along with a permanent result. Another is one in the history books of Circinus where..." Yang interupts, "Stow it Doc! It is stupid and idiotic." A PING alert sounds on the comm panel at your desk. You move over to it and see an automated text message. It appears to be from Front Man. You click OPEN to read the message: My condolences, Commander {Commander.Lastname}. Since you are reading this message, it means that [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] did not survive ROUND 2 of the game. Know that {SCN_MW.DET} debt is now paid in full, and there will be no further reparations needed on {SCN_MW.DET} behalf. In fact, we will be giving you and your crew, a consolation prize. When [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] left on our dropship, we left behind a crate. You will find it magnetically attached to your hull outside the docking collar we used to pick up [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]. It is a shame the game did not go the full term, we could have made so much more money and your prize would have been that much greater. Regards, Front Man You lean back in your chair, exhausted from the watching the ordeal that [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] went through, "Advise the crew, they need to know that [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] is not returning to us. We need to get past this and get on get on with our jobs." As Darius and the others leave, you cannot help but wonder if your path will cross Front Man's again.

"Players 12, 82, 136, 215 and 249 have been eliminated." "3 Seconds Remaining..." {SCN_MW.SUBJ_C} {SCN_MW.Gender?NonBinary:close|Default:closes} {SCN_MW.DET} eyes and cuts the BLACK wire... "Player 203, you have passed this round and will advance to the final game." Tears of joy stream down {SCN_MW.DET} face as reality sinks in that {SCN_MW.SUBJ} {SCN_MW.Gender?NonBinary:have|Default:has} successfully passed this round. ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::Back on the ARGO:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: You and the rest of the bridge crew shout out in unison, "{SCN_MW.SUBJ_C} did it!" Barely able to contain the smiles on your faces, everyone watches the events continuing to unfold on the screen. ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::Hidden game arena on [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]]:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: The door behind [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] opens and two armed and fully masked guards enter. They remove the collar and belt device and confiscate the wire snips. [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] looks at them, knowing the drill and shuffles out the open doorway towards {SCN_MW.DET} own cell. When they finally stop in front the door with the numbers 203 painted on it, the door opens and [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] enters the room. [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] sits on the bed and mutters, "One more game, and then my debt is erased. I can do this. One more game." The voice sounds over the comms, "All players, the next round will begin tomorrow. Lights out in 15 minutes." ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::Back on the ARGO:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: The screen fades out, and is replaced with a SIGNAL TERMINATED notice. Darius looks at you, "Commander, I said it yesterday, pure randomness here, no skill involved. At least we know that [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] only needs to win one more game." Both Yang and Sumire look at Dr Murad when Yang states, "Hey Doc, what is your scientific analysis of this 'game'?" Dr Murad finishes rewatching some of the holo-feed, "Well, the only 'scientific' data I can present actually confirms what Darius has stated. This appears to be nothing more than a series of random tests, a 'leave it to the roll of the dice' decision." You drop into your chair, exhausted from the elation that [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] has survived to reach the final game, but fearful that {SCN_MW.DET} situation can change in the blink of an eye. You look up at Darius, "Let the crew know that [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] has successfully passed Round 2 and is proceeding to the final game soon. "

Description.Name: GAME OVER
Description.Details: ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::Hidden game arena on [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]]:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] reaches up , hand shaking, to place the wire snips closer to the one of the four wires. "20 Seconds Remaining..." {SCN_MW.SUBJ_C} {SCN_MW.Gender?NonBinary:close|Default:closes} {SCN_MW.DET} eyes and mumbles what appears to be a prayer. "15 Seconds Remaining..." [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] opens {SCN_MW.DET} eyes and stares intently at the reflection of the wires in the mirror, quickly inspecting each one, hoping for some sign of which is the correct wire to cut. "10 Seconds Remaining..." {SCN_MW.SUBJ_C} {SCN_MW.Gender?NonBinary:are|Default:is} about to choose a wire when... "Players 17, 36, 54, 112, 185 and 247 have been eliminated." "7 Seconds Remaining..." {SCN_MW.Subj_C} {SCN_MW.Gender?NonBinary:grab|Default:grabs} the BLACK wire and puts the wire snips in position to cut it.. "Players 12, 82, 136, 215 and 249 have been eliminated." "3 Seconds Remaining..." {SCN_MW.SUBJ_C} {SCN_MW.Gender?NonBinary:close|Default:closes} {SCN_MW.DET} eyes and cuts the BLACK wire... ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::Back on the ARGO:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: The holo-feed screen flares bright white and a resounding boom pops through the speakers. Slowly, the screen comes back into focus. Lying on the floor, in a pool of gore and blood is the headless body of [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]. {SCN_MW.SUBJ_C} {SCN_MW.Gender?NonBinary:are|Default:is} only identifiable by the bloodstained PLAYER 203 on {SCN_MW.DET} shirt. The holo-feed continues to flicker, obviously damaged by the explosion. A voice is heard, "Player 203, Eliminated." You watch as Darius, Sumire, Dr Murad and Yang stare at the holo-feed in stunned silence, before dropping yourself into your chair at your desk, mumbling various expletives more to yourself than anyone in the room. Yang breaks the silence, "That has to be the dumbest thing I think I have ever witnessed! Who would concoct such a game?" Dr Murad speaks up, barely able to talk without choking up, "Actually Yang, these types of games are spread throughout history. On Terra, there was a game called Russian Roulette which involved a rotary firearm and a single round, and each participant pointing the weapon at the other one until it eventually fired on a loaded chamber. These games offer similar odds along with a permanent result. Another is one in the history books of Circinus where..." Yang interupts, "Stow it Doc! It is stupid and idiotic." A PING alert sounds on the comm panel at your desk. You move over to it and see an automated text message. It appears to be from Front Man. You click OPEN to read the message: My condolences, Commander {Commander.Lastname}. Since you are reading this message, it means that [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] did not survive ROUND 2 of the game. Know that {SCN_MW.DET} debt is now paid in full, and there will be no further reparations needed on {SCN_MW.DET} behalf. In fact, we will be giving you and your crew, a consolation prize. When [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] left on our dropship, we left behind a crate. You will find it magnetically attached to your hull outside the docking collar we used to pick up [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]. It is a shame the game did not go the full term, we could have made so much more money and your prize would have been that much greater. Regards, Front Man You lean back in your chair, exhausted from the watching the ordeal that [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] went through, "Advise the crew, they need to know that [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] is not returning to us. We need to get past this and get on get on with our jobs." As Darius and the others leave, you cannot help but wonder if your path will cross Front Man's again.
